text: Candu or CANDU may refer to *Candu (Candu.ai, Candu Labs), a UI component builder that enables those who cannot code to build components and user experiences (UX) directly into a SaaS product or website without needing engineering. *CANDU reactor (CANada Deuterium Uranium), a Canadian pressurized heavy water reactor **Advanced CANDU reactor **CANDU Owners Group **Candu Energy, a Canadian organization specializing in the design and supply of nuclear reactors and related products and services *Andrian Candu (born 1975), a Moldovan politician
title: Candu
